text: 21:2 Jeremaia 15:4Manase arazir aghuimɨn gɨn zuir pu. Bar puvatɨ. A gumazamizir igharazir fomɨra nguazir kamɨn ikezibar arazir mɨzɨrɨzir kurabar gɨn zui, ezɨ Ikiavɨra Itir God me batuegha nguazir kam isa Israelia ganɨngi. Ezɨ datɨrɨghɨn Manase Ikiavɨra Itir Godɨn damazimɨn arazir kabagh ami, kar arazir God bar aghuaziba.
